title: Ph.D. Graduates
content:
• Ermao Cai (Ph.D. 2018)
  • Da-Cheng Juan (Ph.D. 2014) [Software Engineer at Google Research, Mountain View, CA]
  • Kai-Chiang (Alex) Wu (Ph.D. 2011) [Assistant Professor at National Chiao Tong University, Taiwan]
  • Siddharth Garg (Ph.D. 2009) [Assistant Professor at New York University]
  • Sebastian Herbert (Ph.D. 2009) [DC Energy, Washington DC]
  • Natasa Miskov-Zivanov (Ph.D. 2008) [Assistant Professor at University of Pittsburgh]
  • Phillip Stanley-Marbell (Ph.D. 2007) [Assistant Professor at Cambridge University]
  • Emil Talpes (Ph.D. 2005) [Tesla, San Jose CA]
